full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** Range Hood, Ventilation Duct, and System Balancing Maintenance Service
**Reference Number:** cb-498-80801861
**Solicitation Number:** 21301-25-4689940

**Tender Overview:**

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) is seeking a contractor to provide range hood, ventilation duct, and system balancing maintenance services for all correctional institutions in the Quebec region. The contractor will be required to provide cleaning and balancing services for the range hoods and ventilation systems in accordance with the CR-2021 "Assessment, Cleaning & Restoration of HVAC Systems" standards.

**Key Dates:**

* Publication Date: April 11, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 22, 2024, 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: May 22, 2024
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to suppliers from Canada and countries participating in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), as well as countries participating in the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement.

**Procurement Method:**

The tender will be awarded through a request for standing offer (RFSA) process. The selection criteria for the tender award will be based on the lowest-priced compliant bid.

**Additional Information:**

* The contractor will be required to provide a sufficient number of resources to meet the requirements of all correctional institutions in the Quebec region.
* The contractor must be able to provide services in both English and French.
* Interested suppliers can submit a bid for one or more correctional institutions.
* The procurement is not subject to any set-asides for Indigenous suppliers.

**Contact Information:**
